longBusinessSummary: Crixus BH3 Acquisition Company does not have significant operations. The company focuses on effecting a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization, or similar business combination with one or more businesses. It intends to focus on businesses that manages, finances, operates, constructs, controls, owns, or supports real estate, construction, or infrastructure related activities. The company was formerly known as BH3 Acquisition Corp. and changed its name to Crixus BH3 Acquisition Company in July 2021. Crixus BH3 Acquisition Company was incorporated in 2021 and is based in Fort Lauderdale, Florida.
